Return all a game's data from the J! Archive

Source: R/whatr-data.R
whatr_data.Rd

Return all a game's data from the J! Archive

whatr_data(game = NULL, date = NULL, show = NULL)

Arguments

game

The J-Archive! game ID number.
date

The original date an episode aired.
show

The sequential show number.

Value

A list of tibbles each containing a data type.

Examples

whatr_data(game = 6304)
#> $info
#> # A tibble: 1 x 3
#>    game  show date      
#>   <int> <int> <date>    
#> 1  6304  8006 2019-06-03
#> 
#> $players
#> # A tibble: 3 x 5
#>   first last      occupation                  city      state   
#>   <chr> <chr>     <chr>                       <chr>     <chr>   
#> 1 Emma  Boettcher User Experience Librarian   Chicago   Illinois
#> 2 Jay   Sexton    Senior Research Engineer    Atlanta   Georgia 
#> 3 James Holzhauer Professional Sports Gambler Las Vegas Nevada  
#> 
#> $order
#> # A tibble: 61 x 4
#>    round   col   row     n
#>    <int> <int> <int> <int>
#>  1     1     2     5     1
#>  2     1     3     5     2
#>  3     1     2     4     3
#>  4     1     1     5     4
#>  5     1     4     5     5
#>  6     1     1     4     6
#>  7     1     1     3     7
#>  8     1     5     5     8
#>  9     1     6     5     9
#> 10     1     6     4    10
#> # … with 51 more rows
